title: Horse Supplies, Pet Supplies, Farm Supplies, Goat Supplies - Valley Vet Supply
author: DIANE M
description: Valley Vet Supply offers pet supplies, dog supplies, horse supplies, horse tack and farm supplies. Free Shipping on Qualifying Orders.
cleaned_text: YOUR ONE-STOP SHOP Offering the best prices and free same-day shipping on most orders - with no membership fees required - why look anywhere else than Valley Vet Supply for your veterinary pharmacy needs and supplies for [horses](c/horse-supplies.html), [livestock](c/livestock-supplies.html) and [pets](c/pet-supplies.html). With a seasoned team of Technical Service veterinarians, licensed pharmacists and technicians, and customer-care experts, we're here to help you and your animals. Founded by veterinarians in 1985 and based in the Heartland, Valley Vet Supply is your one-stop shop for meds and more. We work hard for you, so you can work hard for your dreams. ANIMAL HEALTH CENTER FARM CARE ARTICLES Grow profits with improved cattle health and livestock management. [Read More](library/farm-articles.html) HORSE CARE ARTICLES Help ensure horse health for years of happy trails. [Read More](library/horse-articles.html) PET CARE ARTICLES Ensure happy, healthy pets from their whiskers to their wagging tail.
